communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Untitled
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records describing the location, technical design, and and operational details of the servers that operate the Maryland Mobile ID program.

Specifically, this includes:

1. The location of any servers used to operate the program. 
2. The identity of any IT consulting agencies and contractors responsible for operating the digital server infrastructure, if such entities exist.
3. Any contractual arrangements made between the State of Maryland and the above contractors/consultants, including arrangements that relate to citizen’s data privacy.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew D. Green

communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Public Records Request - Austintown
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to video footage from a police intervention, specifically from the body camera worn by the officer(s) and the dashcam of the police vehicles involved. Article:
https://www.wfmj.com/story/51807353/suspect-arrested-after-alleged-robbery-footsniffing-incident-in-austintown

Exact date of incident: November 15th 2024
Names of parties involved: Nathaniel Frybarger
Location: 5000 block of Mahoning Avenue

I intend to use this footage solely for educational purposes to promote a better understanding of law enforcement procedures and the application of the law.

I understand that there may be associated costs for providing this footage, and I am more than willing to cover any fees incurred. Please inform me about the necessary procedures and the costs involved.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I trust that this footage will be invaluable for my educational efforts, and I greatly appreciate your cooperation.


Best regards,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

George Smith
